description.narrative:
Magariro - Association for Community Development is based in Chimoio - Manica Province, organization that works to support communities in the development and implementation of disaster management programs and humanitarian crises. Magariro has great potential for planning , implementation and management of humanitarian operations , need only formalize its vision and mission and strategic plan incorporate in this scope. Magariro has excellent partnership with many actors of humanitarian action such as Oxfam (America, Canada, GB and Intermón), Concern Worldwide , World Food Program and INGC at Manica provincial level.
Magariro has been involved in emergency response since 2001, 2007 and 2008 and 2010 as a result of floods and floods of the Zambezi River. The main purpose of this project is to empower Magariro to have a critical eye and an informed decision about the management of the humanitarian situation in the country, participate effectively and sustainably in the prevention , mitigation and disaster management , including direct support to vulnerable population affected. The project is the result of a thorough analysis carried out by the organization itself with facilitation of Oxfam Novib and identified and prioritized some thematic areas critical to prevent or limit the ability to Magariro and humanitarian mandate . Overall objective is to contribute to reducing disaster risk in Mozambique by strengthening the role of Magariro in humanitarian issues.
Results: # Magariro Trained in the Humanitarian Action Strategy. # Programs and projects holistic community development integrating cross-cutting issues relevant to their context with emphasis on public health , environment, gender ,water and sanitation , prevention, mitigation and management of disasters and humanitarian crises of natural and human nature.

participating-org.narrative:
Magariro - Association for Community Development, is a national NGO, nonprofit, formally constituted on 16 July 2001 by Order of the Minister of Justice of the Republic of Mozambique. Magariro means in the various languages spoken in central Mozambique, "the way of being in the society, the appreciation of what is ours, our culture and identity as Mozambicans".
Magariro operats in the folowwing areas (1) Promotion of good governance by influencing participatory approach in formulation of public policies and systems to enhance accountability and transparency. (2) Livelihood, (3) Micri-finance (4) Capacity building of distritc based organizations
Magariro- Ass.Des.Comunitário Associação para o Desenvolvimento C
